EmployeeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

EmployeeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

EmployeeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Employee_Defined_Contribution_Election_D.description: A unique identifier for an employee.
The date the retirement savings elections take effect for the employee.

Retirement_Savings_PlanObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Retirement_Savings_PlanObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Retirement_Savings_PlanObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: A unique identifier for the retirement savings plan.

validation.validation: The employee [employee] is not eligible for [plan] as of [date].

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: Percentage of salary for retirement savings election. Pick either percentage or amount.

validation.validation: Election Percentage is greater than the allowed Contribution Percentage Maximum for [benefit plan].  Please correct the Election Percentage so that it is less than or equal to the Contribution Percentage Maximum.
validation.description: Election Percentage is greater than the allowed Contribution Percentage Maximum for the benefit plan.

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: Contains the contribution amount for the retirement savings election.

validation.validation: Election Amount is greater than the allowed Contribution Amount Maximum for [benefit plan].  Please correct the Election Percentage so that it is less than or equal to the Contribution Percentage Maximum.
validation.description: The Election Amount cannot be greater than the allowed Contribution Amount Maximum for the benefit plan.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: A unique identifier for the currency.  This can only be populated when the benefit plan is amount based.  If the currency is not provided, the it is defaulted from the benefit plan.

FrequencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

FrequencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

FrequencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: A unique identifier for the frequency.  This can only be populated when the benefit plan is amount based.  If the frequency is not provided, the it is defaulted from the benefit plan.

BeneficiaryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

BeneficiaryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

BeneficiaryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: [beneficiary] is not a valid beneficiary for [employee].

Beneficary_Allocation_Percentage_Data.description: Percentage allocation for primary beneficiary. Mutually exclusive with Contingent Percentage.

Defined_Contribution_Beneficiary_Allocat.description: Percentage allocation for primary or contingent beneficiary.

Defined_Contribution_Election_Data.description: Defines the Beneficiary recipient and the allocation percentage for the Retirement Savings Election.  This is required when the retirement savings plan requires beneficiaries and the election amount or election percentage is populated (i.e. greater than 0).

Employee_Defined_Contribution_Election_D.description: Contains election percent or amount and beneficiary allocation information.  If the Election Percentage and Election Amount are left blank, then an existing election is removed.  If there is no existing election for the benefit plan and the Election Percentage and Election Amount are left blank, then no election will be created.

validation.validation: You must elect one or more Primary Beneficiaries totaling 100%.
validation.description: You must elect one or more Primary Beneficiaries totaling 100%.

validation.validation: Contingent Beneficiary percentage must total 0% or 100%
validation.description: Contingent Beneficiary percentage must total 0% or 100%

validation.validation: [benefit plan] requires beneficiaries.  Please add beneficiaries for this election.
validation.description: One or more benefit plans require at least one beneficiary designation.  You must enter a beneficiary or change your election.  You may be required to enter a beneficiary if you were automatically enrolled in this benefit plan.

validation.validation: Election Percentage can't be entered as [benefit plan] is Amount-Based.
validation.description: Election Percentage can't be entered when Retirement Savings Plan is Amount-Based.

validation.validation: Election Amount can't be entered as [benefit plan] is Percentage-Based.
validation.description: Election Amount can't be entered when Retirement Savings Plan is Percentage-Based.

validation.validation: The [benefit plan] can only be specified once for an election.
validation.description: The benefit plan can only be specified once for an election.  Please remove one of the elections for the benefit plan.
